code: import React from'react';import'./EventCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventCard=_ref=>{let{event}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:event.image,alt:event.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:event.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Date: ",event.date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Time: ",event.time]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Venue: ",event.venue]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: ",event.cost]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:event.description})]})]});};export default EventCard;
